dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 2132 IH: Marianas Air Service Improvement Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. King-Hinds introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 49, United States Code, to exempt Northern Mariana Islands from certain eligibility requirements for essential air service program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Marianas Air Service Improvement Act.

section.header: Exception for locations in Northern Mariana Islands
section.text: Section 41731(c) of title 49, United States Code, is amended to read as follows:

subsection.header: Exception for locations in Alaska, Hawaii, and Northern Mariana Islands
subsection.text: Subparagraphs (B), (C), and (D) of subsection (a)(1) shall not apply with respect to locations in the State of Alaska, the State of Hawaii, or the Northern Mariana Islands.
